help-file.title: HATRED
help-file.content: Dwarves are as changeable as the rock they came from but as a result they also never forget. Many are the long wars fought against the invading orcs and the battles against the duergar dwarves and drow elves. Over the passing millennia deep hatred has grown into the hearts of all dwarves and they will battle this evil anywhere and everywhere. A result of this hatred is a rage that will help a dwarf to keep on fighting when others others would tire and to fight with determination unheard of.
